What is BNB?

Binance Coin is a product of Binance, one of the largest crypto exchanges in the world, so it is no wonder why so many Binance casinos are popping up all of a sudden. Binance coin is primarily used as a utility token that allows users to receive discounts when paying for trading fees. This means that its main utility is limited to the Binance ecosystem and its products. It is also used as currency, just like most crypto, and comes with low fees which make Binance coin a good option.

How Does It Perform?

Decentralization: Being the native coin of a new smart blockchain, BNB is used in both centralized and decentralized finance. Binance currently holds more than 80 % of BNB, making it highly centralized. The fact that it is a closed source is also a negative aspect.

Safety: Binance itself is the biggest crypto exchange in the world. Considering that BNB is the native token of Binance, it is easy to assume that it will be a safe investment. Binance is currently under investigation by the US Justice Department due to the concerns that this crypto is being used to conceal illegal transactions. Hacks have also happened in the past; $40 million has never been recovered after one such attack.

Scalability: Binance coin is very promising in regard to scalability, with fees staying low despite the growth it experienced this year. Even with an ever-increasing number of applications on the smart chain gas fees remain low, which is a good indicator that fees will remain manageable.

BNB Fees

The fee is determined by Binance smart chain traffic, similarly to Ethereum smart chain and Ether. Fees are named gas, same as on the Ethereum chain. Fees are currently very low as the smart chain is relatively new.

Coin value in relation to fees:
Binance Coin had a big bull run, eventually reaching around $300. Even at this price, transaction fees (gas) are still measured in cents, even with huge transactions. With Ethereum Smart Chain gas fees constantly growing, many users are switching to the Binance Smart Chain.

Binance Coin NFT

You can buy Binance Coin NFTs on the Binance NFT marketplace! Binance’s market place also allows you to mint BNB NFTs.

BNB casino pros & cons

Pros

  • Fast transaction times.
  • Coin is volatile, which can be an advantage if you held the coin and used it in a Binance casino, before its price got up.
  • Low fees.

Cons

  • Not every crypto casino is a Binance casino.
  • That same volatility can also be a disadvantage, if the price goes down and you already hold the currency.

Are Online Binance Casinos Safe?

Binance casino is as safe as any other crypto casino. There are two aspects players can focus on when considering if a certain Binance casino should be considered safe or not. One of them is how the casino acts towards their players, if they are paying out their winnings and not “stealing” from them so to speak, and the other is how well a specific BNB casino is protected from outside hack attacks.

When it comes to safety it is best that you decide for yourself if the casino is safe enough for you to play on by reading various casino reviews and players’ input about the casino. We would also like to add that the casinos listed on the very top of the listing have the best player retention, which means that players keep coming back to play again and again. Thus we can safely speculate that they regularly pay out players’ winnings, because if they didn’t they would have a much lower rating and players wouldn’t return.

Binance Coin Games

I only list casinos which allow you to play with Binance Coin. A certain Binance casino might convert it to their internal currency when you make a deposit, and then convert it back to BNB at withdrawal. But if this is the case, the casino does so for all currencies and not just for BNB; it’s simply the way they operate.

You can play almost all games with Binance Coin just as you would with Bitcoin, for example. Some game providers have certain restrictions in regards to which coins can be used for playing their games. But if a casino offers the option to play with Binance Coin, then they also have a large collection of Binance Coin games available, whether you prefer Binance Coin slots, poker, roulette, blackjack or some other table game or live game.

Also keep in mind that BC.Game, Cloudbet, Crashino and Thunderpick have some of their own, provably fair games as well, so you should be covered! We would like to point out that Cloudbet is primarily a sports betting platform, however all of the mentioned casinos include crash games. So pick your favorite casino, deposit your Binance Coin and

May the odds be ever in your favor!

Binance Coin Slots are one of the easiest if not THE easiest game and that is why players love it so much. All you have to do in order to win is press the spin now button and hope for the best. In addition, there is also a progressive jackpot option that gathers a fraction of players’ bets and adds them to the jackpot!

For Binance Coin Blackjack players have to have some knowledge about the game and the strategies beforehand, if they wish to beat it and win. Overall, the rules are still fairly simple. You play versus the dealer and not vs. other players. The goal is to get as high a hand as you can, without exceeding 21.

Binance Coin Poker is one of the hardest games you can play and you need to know quite a few rules and strategies in order to win. In addition, you play against other players and not vs. a machine or the dealer, which makes the game that much more fun!

Binance Coin Roulette is also one of the simpler games where you can win a lot of money. Here, all you have to do in order to win is to pick your bet and predict the bracket in which the ball is hopefully going to fall into. Or you can pick one of the popular roulette strategies and play it that way.

How To Choose The Best BNB Casino?

There are quite a couple of different things a player can consider when deciding which Binance Coin casino to pick. Such as what kind of bonuses does the casino offer and what are the terms and conditions on said bonuses. Bonuses typically come with a wagering requirement. You can learn about the wagering requirement by reading the bonuses T&C or by contacting the support.

Another quite important thing to consider when choosing the best BNB casino is their minimum and maximum deposit and withdrawal conditions. They are all set internally and quite vary between the casinos. Heck, the conditions might even vary between different currencies.

And lastly, you should also consider the amount of game types a certain Binance Coin casino supports. If you are just embarking on your gambling journey and you want to play a specific game, we suggest that you also keep in mind that as time will go on, you will most likely want to play and experience different games. That is why it would be smart to pick a casino that has a wide variety of games and not only a couple.

FAQs

Players are able to claim all bonuses and bonus types. The fact that a certain casino is considered a Binance Coin casino, makes no difference. On the other hand, you might find a specific bonus that was made just for Binance Coin!

They function the same way as any other crypto casino, except that instead of using Bitcoin or Ethereum as their main currency they use Binance Coin instead and carry out most of their promotions with said currency.

Generally speaking, Binance Coin gambling sites don’t have any extra restrictions when you compare Binance casinos with a regular one. However, you can check our country guides in case you’re coming from a frequently restricted territory to see which casinos are available to you:

  • Australia
  • Canada
  • Germany
  • New Zealand
  • UK
  • USA

Binance Coin is the native token of the most well-known and used crypto exchange – Binance. So chances are that it is pretty secure, since everything is going well so far. However, it is worth mentioning that no cryptocurrency or blockchain-based application is 100 % safe since there is always a chance of hack attacks.

No. You can’t gamble on Binance, because Binance is an online exchange. The project, however, has its own cryptocurrency called Binance Coin, with which you can use to gamble BNB casinos.
